meanings: (말·충고 등을) listen (to), follow, obey, take (one's advice), (Am) mind, (formal) heed
(효과가 있다) have an effect (on), be effective, work (for), act (on)
It will make you sick if you hear it, but if you do not, it will make you feel better

phrases.phrase: 듣기 좋은 이야기도 늘 들으면 싫다
meanings: Even pleasant words if heard all the time will be tiring

meanings.meaning: when you've seen, heard, etc. one, you've seen, heard, etc. them all

vlive.korean: 들으면 좋겠다~ it would be good to listen to. 듣기 View video ITZY : 깜짝리아브이 기다렸찌~?✌️
vlive.english: it would be good to listen to.

vlive.korean: 너무 좋죠? 이렇게 소리 들으면은? It's so nice if you listen to the sound, right? 듣기 View video ITZY : 깜짝리아브이 기다렸찌~?✌️
vlive.english: It's so nice if you listen to the sound, right?

vlive.korean: 뭔가 되게 원래 들으면 약간 자기... 이렇게 되잖아요? 나만 그런가? and while listening to it... I was like... This? Is it just me? 듣기 View video ITZY : 류진이의 왓어원더풀나잇💙
vlive.english: and while listening to it... I was like... This? Is it just me?

vlive.korean: 못 들으면... Since we can't hear. 듣기 View video KIM JAEHWAN(김재환) : [김재환] 화요일 저녁은 재환이랑 치킨먹어요🍗
내년에 들으면 안 되나? Can I listen to it next year? 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : [7회] '그렇게 별로였나..' 랩 포지션 평가 점수 발표
vlive.english: Can I listen to it next year?

examples.korean: The song never failed to elevate his spirits. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 노래만 들으면 그는 어김없이 기분이 좋아졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The song never failed to elevate his spirits. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This will amuse you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이거 들으면[보면] 너 재미있을 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This will amuse you. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He’ll go loopy when he hears! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 들으면 미친 듯이 화를 낼 거야! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’ll go loopy when he hears! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her music always sends me to sleep. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 음악을 들으면 난 항상 잠이 온다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her music always sends me to sleep. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Whoops, you weren’t supposed to hear that. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어머나, 너는 그 얘기를 들으면 안 되는데. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Whoops, you weren’t supposed to hear that. Add to Wordbook
